div.pre: 87 Cranidi environs, near Castri (anc. (278) Hermione), Argolis, 1863 Burial: c. 325-300 B.C. (T) Contents: 500+ AR, AE. Pot hoard Aegina: ob. Argos: ob. Hermione: ob. Tiryns: AE Disposition: Athens 15 (2 Aegina, 1 Argos, 2 Hermione, 10 Tiryns) Courtois, RN 1864, pp. 178-86 Svoronos, JIAN 1907, pp. 5-34, illus. The AE of Scyros listed by Noe is probably not part of the hd.
